def InitializeRow(entity, row): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityBase from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import ListItem from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityAssociation from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerContext from Benner.Tecnologia.Common.Exceptions import CancelledOperationException
if (not entity is None): handleResponsavel = entity.Fields["RESPONSAVEL"].Handle handleUsuario = BennerContext.Security.GetLoggedUserHandle() row.EditCommand.Visible = (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 and handleUsuario == handleResponsavel) row.DeleteCommand.Visible = (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 and handleUsuario == handleResponsavel) row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_EXECUTAR").Enabled = (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 and handleUsuario == handleResponsavel) row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_CANCELAR").Enabled = ((entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2 or entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1) and handleUsuario == handleResponsavel)
def OnCMD_EXECUTARExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma a execução da Ação de Relacionamento?")
def OnCMD_CANCELARExecute(command, entity): command.RequestConfirmationBeforeExecute("Confirma o cancelamento da Ação de Relacionamento?")
